articles.title: 'Don’t care Johnson broke law - what matters is results' Edwina Currie in huge row on GMB - Express
articles.description: EDWINA CURRIE has insisted she 'really doesn't care' if Boris Johnson broke the law as she warned against a resignation while the conflict continues in Ukraine, telling ITV viewers the Russian President 'would be laughing' if the Prime Minister stepped down.
